entry.title: The Phase That Pays
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,822Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 60

Summary: After the nogitsune, Stiles learned how to disappear quietly.In oversized clothes, empty laughter, and meals that end in cold porcelain, he unravels slowly—in corners no one looks at,in details no one knows how to name.The pack sees him.They just don’t know how to help.But Derek does.With glances that linger too long, with silences that speak louder than words,he starts picking up the pieces before Stiles even realizes he's breaking.This is a story about someone who’s forgotten how to exist—and someone who chooses to stay anyway.

Author: unvsval

entry.title: symphonic devotion
entry.summary:
Author: hansuckss

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,281Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 8

Summary: “When fate is messed with, it punishes those who messes with the flow of time and rewards those who were affected.”  After taking his own life in a bathtub, Derek Hale wakes up as a ghost trapped in a strange, distorted version of his neighborhood—alongside another ghost named ‘Stiles’. Neither remembers anything about their past, but they're inexplicably tied to one another. All they have to guide them are an old piano and two eerily familiar houses.Or; two memory-less spirits search for answers about who they were, why they're connected, and what this so-called “happy ending” is all about—only to discover comfort and companionship in each other along the way. - as seen on wattpad -

entry.title: This Is Not Me Falling for You (Except It Definitely Is)
entry.summary:
Author: Hathly

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,179Chapters: 2/12Kudos: 31

Summary: Stiles didn’t expect to see Derek Hale at college. Not after years of teenage antagonism, not after that one summer where Derek glared at him for breathing too loud. But suddenly Derek is here—older, hotter, and somehow the only person who knows Stiles’ schedule better than his own.Now they’re kind-of-maybe friends. If friends argued over superhero rankings, walked each other to class like it’s a rom-com, and accidentally held hands under the stars.

entry.title: Just Kids, Once
entry.summary:
Author: hubrys

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,977Chapters: 4/10Kudos: 61

Summary: “You left. Just like that. No goodbyes. No nothing.”“Stiles, I—”“Don’t. You walked away, Derek. After everything. I needed you to stay.”“I didn’t know how.”“You weren’t the first to go. Maybe just the one I hoped wouldn’t.”_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________They grew up clinging to each other in a house that promised nothing. Years later, Stiles dances in a cage and Derek’s about to get married. Some stories don’t start with love. Some start when everything else has already fallen apart.

entry.title: How to colossally fuck shit up
entry.summary:
Author: Cashewchococake

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,811Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 107

Summary: Derek is brought back to life by our favorite FBI-agent, Stiles Stilinski.They have sex and Derek gets pregnant.A story about Derek and Stiles building their family and trying to find their way to each other.orStiles was looking at him expectedly.Derek took a deep breath and prepared himself for the upcoming words. “But I wasn’t the only one he smelled like, Stiles.”He looked pleadingly at Stiles, who'd gone deathly pale, and was now shaking his head.“Stiles-, Eli is your son.” Derek forced out.Stiles let out a small breathless sound of “Oh!”He shot up from the couch and took his head between his hands, pulling his hair.When that didn’t help to quiet the raging flood of questions in his head, he started pacing.“What? -I mean…how? How is that even possible?""Why the hell would you keep that from me?” He was spluttering.Stiles couldn’t believe what he was hearing. Why would Derek do that?

entry.title: Unlisted Bonus Track
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,822Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 12

Summary: Stiles never imagined that college would be the beginning of a new nightmare.Amidst the chaos of being forced to share a room with Derek, the silent and annoying enigma that seems to be everywhere, Stiles can barely handle the pressure of the present. But something is in the air, something that makes him question: what does he really know about the people around him? And, most importantly, about himself?Derek seems to be the only one who watches him from afar, without asking. But Stiles has his own ghosts — ghosts from a past he never wanted to relive. When the weight of them threatens to destroy everything he has, the line between what’s real and what’s disintegrating begins to fade.The last thing Stiles needs is someone reminding him of his scars. But maybe it’s too late to run from them.What happens when the past and the present collide on a path Stiles can’t ignore? And in the end, does he really want to escape?The music is already playing. And it’s not the first time Stiles has heard this tune.

entry.title: Unapologetically Ours
entry.summary:
Author: PheonixInk

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 994Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 65

Summary: Derek and Stiles have long since stopped caring about what other people think. When they’re caught sharing a kiss in the middle of the pack meeting, they don’t even flinch. They only have eyes for each other, and that’s enough.
